## TinySynq.getLastSync() method

Returns an ISO8601 formatted date and time of the last successful local sync.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getLastSync(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

The time of the last sync.

## Remarks

A "local sync" is the process of sending local changes to the remote hub.
